doc:
Michael Cristofer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Cristofer 0 Michael Ivan Cristofer (born January 22, 1945) is an American playwright, filmmaker and actor. He received the Pulitzer Prize for Drama and the Tony Award for Best Play for The Shadow Box in 1977. Michael_Ivan_Cristofer ( born January_22_,_1945 ) is an_American_playwright , filmmaker_and_actor . He received the_Pulitzer_Prize for Drama and the_Tony_Award for Best_Play for The_Shadow_Box in 1977 .
